{"id":563520910,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1633014964,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/563520910/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int sum=accumulate(nums.begin(),nums.end(),0);\n        if(sum-nums[0]==0)\n            return 0;\n      \n        sum-=nums[nums.size()-1];\n        int c=0; int mini=INT_MAX;\n          if(sum==0)\n           {\n              mini=nums.size()-1;\n              c=1;\n          }\n        int sum1=nums[nums.size()-1];\n        \n        int i=nums.size()-2;\n       \n        while(i>=0)\n        {\n            sum-=nums[i];\n            if(sum==sum1)\n               {\n                mini=min(mini,i);\n                c=1;\n            }\n            sum1+=nums[i];\n            i--;\n        }\n        if(c==1)\n            return mini;\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
